hero.title: Make Web Data Collection
hero.description: Octopus Crawler is a powerful browser extension that enables web scraping, automation, and workflow recording without programming
hero.browserSupport: Supports Chrome, Edge, Firefox and more

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything to make data collection easier

visualSelection.title: Visual Selection
visualSelection.description: No coding required, create scraping rules by clicking page elements, what you see is what you get

autoPagination.title: Auto Pagination
autoPagination.description: Intelligently identifies pagination buttons, automatically traverses all pages, one-click complete data collection

multipleFormats.title: Multiple Export Formats
multipleFormats.description: Export to Excel, CSV, JSON and more formats to meet different needs

highSpeed.title: High-Speed Collection
highSpeed.description: Multi-threaded concurrent collection, intelligent deduplication, greatly improving data collection efficiency

recordActions.title: Action Recording
recordActions.description: Record browser operation workflows, automatically generate repeatable automation scripts

loginSupport.title: Login Support
loginSupport.description: Supports websites requiring login, automatically handles Cookies and Sessions

dynamicPages.title: Dynamic Pages
dynamicPages.description: Perfect support for modern web pages with Ajax, React, Vue and other dynamic loading

scheduledTasks.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduledTasks.description: Set up scheduled collection tasks, automatically monitor web page changes, get latest data in time

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.description: Collection rules saved in cloud, multi-device sync, use anytime anywhere

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Find the perfect application for your industry

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Monitoring
ecommerce.description: Monitor competitor prices, sales, reviews and adjust your strategy accordingly

market.title: Market Research
market.description: Quickly collect industry data, analyze market trends, and support decision-making

content.title: Content Aggregation
content.description: Collect news, articles, and information from multiple websites to build a personalized content platform

research.title: Academic Research
research.description: Collect papers, patents, literature and other academic materials to assist research work

recruitment.title: Job Information
recruitment.description: Aggregate job information from major recruitment websites to quickly find your dream job

realestate.title: Real Estate
realestate.description: Collect property information, analyze price trends, and assist in home buying decisions

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Local extension + Cloud service, flexible to meet different needs
pricing.localPluginDesc: Run directly in your browser, simple and easy to use

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join tens of thousands of users and make data collection simple and efficient

footer.description: Make web data collection simple and efficient
